quotes.message: There's a level of immaturity to people who just can't clean up after themselves.
quotes.name: Jann Wenner

quotes.message: For many, immaturity is an ideal, not a defect.
quotes.name: Mason Cooley

quotes.message: Comb your immaturity if you want to grow.
quotes.name: Kishore Bansal

quotes.message: Another unsettling element in modern art is that common symptom of immaturity, the dread of doing what has been done before.
quotes.name: Edith Wharton

quotes.message: Remaining childish is a tremendous state of innocence.
quotes.name: John Lydon

quotes.message: A childish mind griped to unexpected changes.
quotes.name: Toba Beta

quotes.message: He's like a child, but without a child's capacity for joy.
quotes.name: Eva Heller

quotes.message: Revenge is always the weak pleasure of a little and narrow mind.
quotes.name: Juvenal

quotes.message: I was very immature when I was young, and for me there was no balance. Everything was just all or nothing.
quotes.name: Mickey Rourke

quotes.message: Most people grow old, but not everybody grows up.
quotes.name: Nishan Panwar

quotes.message: If you keep playing games you're going to be playing them alone.
quotes.name: Sonya Parker

quotes.message: As long as people believe in absurdities they will continue to commit atrocities.
quotes.name: Voltaire

quotes.message: Some people are like trees, they take forever to grow up.
quotes.name: Ana Sandoval

quotes.message: ... Nine-year-old boys usually turn ten at some point. It's the nineteen-year-olds who have difficulty turning twenty.
quotes.name: John Boyne

quotes.message: We're kind of like the smoking section in high school. We're immature, keep to ourselves.
quotes.name: Matt Stone

quotes.message: You are only young once, but you can stay immature indefinitely
quotes.name: Ogden Nash

quotes.message: Our element is unending immaturity.
quotes.name: Witold Gombrowicz

quotes.message: Inconsistencies in men are generally testimony to their immaturity
quotes.name: Edwin Louis Cole

quotes.message: What I look forward to is continued immaturity followed by death.
quotes.name: Dave Barry

quotes.message: There were times my immaturity kept me from being all I wanted to be.
quotes.name: Len Elmore

quotes.message: This weekend showed our immaturity. We're not the team that we thought we were.
quotes.name: Ben Lamanna

quotes.message: To the immature, other people are not real.
quotes.name: Harry Overstreet

quotes.message: To resolve problems through negotiation is a very childish approach.
quotes.name: Maharishi Mahesh Yogi

quotes.message: Making bad decisions is a part of life. Blaming others for your bad decisions is immature.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Immature is the love of the youth, and immature his hatred of man and earth. His mind and the wings of his spirit are still tied down and heavy.
quotes.name: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.message: People who have no hold over their process of thinking are likely to be ruined by liberty of thought. If thought is immature, liberty of thought becomes a method of converting men into animals.
quotes.name: Muhammad Iqbal

quotes.message: Some people need to stop being immature. Seriously grow up.
quotes.name: Mahmoud El Hallab

quotes.message: Immature is aword boring people use to describe fun people.
quotes.name: Will Ferrell

quotes.message: Just because your pain is understandable, doesn't mean your behavior is acceptable.
quotes.name: Steve Maraboli

quotes.message: An adult can correctly tell a kid, ‘what you are I was and what I am you will be’. And unlike a child he cannot misplace priority due to purity and immaturity.
quotes.name: Vincent Okay Nwachukwu

quotes.message: Immaturity exists in every human; however, it becomes the prisoner of the maturity force, whether it is real or pretended; it naturally escapes on many occasions.
quotes.name: Ehsan Sehgal

quotes.message: Man’s growth is held back by his surrender to other people’s expectation that he remain the person he was when they met him.
quotes.name: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quotes.message: In short, immaturity is spoiled. And what is spoiled doesn’t ripen. It goes bad early, gets bitter and withers on the vine.
quotes.name: Gina Barreca

quotes.message: Continuously feeling superior is a characteristic of immaturity.
quotes.name: Eraldo Banovac

quotes.message: The young have all the same flaws adults do. Plus one: immaturity.
quotes.name: Nelson Rodrigues

quotes.message: Maturity comes not with age but with the acceptance of responsibility.
quotes.name: Edwin Louis Cole

quotes.message: Immaturity means self-centeredness, inability to compromise, to rise above hurt feelings, to postpone immediate pleasures in favor of future benefits, or to do unpleasant chores when they need to be done.
quotes.name: Arnold J. Toynbee

quotes.message: So far in the history of the world, there have never been enough mature people in the right places.
quotes.name: G. B. Chisholm

quotes.message: The most dangerous members of our society are those grownups whose powers of influence are adult but whose motives and responses are infantile.
quotes.name: Harry Allen Overstreet

quotes.message: The mark of the immature man is that he wants to die nobly for a cause, while the mark of the mature man is that he wants to live humbly for one.
quotes.name: Wilhelm Stekel

quotes.message: You can only be young once. But you can always be immature.
quotes.name: Dave Barry

quotes.message: You are physically and socially mature. You are, of course, intellectually immature. So are we, on the staff; so is everybody. In the intellectual world the only mature people are those who are willing to admit their immaturity.
quotes.name: Northrop Frye

quotes.message: An immature ear of corn appears first.
quotes.name: Japanese Proverb

quotes.message: Politics are usually the executive expression of human immaturity.
quotes.name: Vera Brittain

quotes.message: Imagination: the supreme delight of the immortal and the immature.
quotes.name: Vladimir Nabokov

quotes.message: The first sign of maturity is not reacting to others' immaturity.
quotes.name: D. Muthukrishnan

quotes.message: Maturity does not match, with immaturity.
quotes.name: Ehsan Sehgal

quotes.message: Longing for the ideal, while criticizing the real is evidence of immaturity.
quotes.name: Rick Warren
